recipesJson.name: Apple Dapple You
recipesJson.author: ProudClod
recipesJson.description:
Another of my first originals. Wanted to go for the "apple cereal" flavor without using the name brand as the title. So I used one of the knock off names with a Prince song twist :) 
Using Fuji Apple and Apple Pie together allowed the apple to easily meld with a more sugary cereal flavor without it tasting like two separate mixes. Sugar Cookie for added sweetness and some of the bakery. Finally, AP gives it a bit of graininess that was much needed when I was testing it without. Will be opening the books again on this flavor soon, working with other possible meringues and/or bakery flavors, tweaking %'s, etc. Welcome feedback and criticisms of all kinds on this recipe.

reviews.text: I don't get apple jacks from it, but it's a really good apple pie.
